landing.subtitle: Transform Your Body, Transform Your Life

phrase1.part1: Build a body that speaks for you.

phrases.phrase2: Transform your physique. Transform your life.

phrase3.part1: With no muscles comes no respect.
phrase3.part2: Build a body that commands attention.

phrases.phrase4: Discipline builds muscle. Muscle builds confidence.
phrases.phrase6: Your body is your first impression. Make it count.

philosophy.legacy: We combine ambition with transformation. Through discipline and dedication, Golden Era delivers unmatchable results for those who dare to become successful people.
philosophy.text: In a world full of weak individuals, strength is what dominates. Transform your body with science. Reclaim your respect. This program is only for those who are ready to become part of the Elite.

results.title: Guaranteed
results.text: Train with those who lead this world. We only take 50 clients per year. This program is not for everyone, it's only for the ones who dare to become elite. Experience your ideal body in just 60 days.

coach.title: Your Coach
coach.name: Mateo Haces
coach.description: Fan of weights, and specialist in calisthenics, and MMA. CEO of Golden Era.

method.title: GOLDEN ERA METHOD
method.description: Our proven 3-step system to transform your body and mind into an unstoppable force.

join.description: Get instant access to your personalized training plan, nutrition guide, and exclusive Golden Era community.

material.title: Access Premium Material
material.description: Receive your custom workout routines, meal plans, supplement protocols, and exclusive video content from our coaches.

work.title: Work & Transform
work.description: Follow the program with discipline, track your progress, and watch your body transform into its golden version.

whyItWorks.subtitle: Our method is a compilation of science based lifting studies which unlock a persons full athletic potential.

motivational.buildBody: Build a body that speaks for you.

testimonial1.text: Greatness isn't born; it is achieved through relentless discipline.
testimonial1.author: Andrew Tate

testimonial2.text: Your body is your empire. Build it with sweat, not excuses.
testimonial2.author: Amades Llanos

testimonial3.text: The only way you gain mental toughness is to do things you're not happy doing. If you're comfortable, you're not growing.
testimonial3.author: David Goggins

footer.description: Stop waiting and start now. Contact us so we can help you get your dream body.

errors.nameTooShort: Name must be at least 2 characters
errors.nameInvalid: Name can only contain letters and spaces

hero.subtitle: The Weak Make Excuses. The Strong Make History.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: At Golden Era, we don't accept mediocrity. We transform the ambitious into the unstoppable. If you seek comfort, look elsewhere. Here we forge warriors who dominate in business, relationships, and life. Your weak body is a reflection of your weak mind. We fix both.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: We envision a world where men are men. Where strength isn't optional, it's mandatory. Where every man walking the street radiates power, respect, and absolute dominance. The weak fear us. The strong respect us. The wise join us.

discipline.title: Discipline
discipline.text: Without discipline you're a slave to your impulses. With discipline you're the architect of your destiny.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.text: Mediocrity is cancer. Excellence is the only cure. Be exceptional or be forgotten.

transformation.title: Transformation
transformation.text: We destroy your weak version to build your unstoppable version. Pain is temporary, greatness is eternal.

leadership.title: Leadership
leadership.text: Leaders aren't born, they're forged in iron and sweat. Be the man other men want to be.

power.title: Absolute Power
power.subtitle: Your weak physique screams your lack of discipline. Time to shut mouths and open eyes.

cta.title: Will You Stay Weak or Become Legendary?
cta.text: Only 50 warriors per year. The weak hesitate. The strong act. Which are you?
